channel.title: FuturSoft RPG
channel.description:
Introduction: futurSoft RPG is based of final fantasy BUT its less fantasyish less fights and more quests Development: FuturSoft Developments founder has created this product as an RPG version of their servers : , FuturScape, Parliscape, Demonicscape, FuturscapeV1-9, Demonicscape 7 etc... ; Will be making a more full version currently im only releasing the DEMO to the public.
Coded in: Ruby ( W00T for ruby! ) Quests: Demo version: ( 3 total ) so far... may make more demo quests Missin' Kitten - save the boys kitten before the shop keeper notices you Godly Heaven - Get to the 15 godly Heavens in time! ( redo-able(ra)) King o' Destiny - find a way to the dark kings world and you will see this special cut scene - (not ra) Full Version: ( 5 total ) so far.... may make more quests Missin' Kitten - save the boys kitten before the shop keeper notices you Godly Heaven - Get to the 15 godly Heavens in time! ( redo-able(ra)) King o' Destiny - find a way to the dark kings world and you will see this special cut scene - (not ra) The Three Temples - defeat the three boses of the three temples The Three Caves - defeat the three boses of the three caves Pictures: click the link
http://img86.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img86/200/1172223228qti.smil
Creator: Pbrain30 (me) Hosted by www.<censored>g<censored>games.com can never remember that :S had to copy + paste it
Characters so far: 1:Adam 2:Basil 3:Cyrus 4:Dorothy 5:Estelle 6:Felix 7:Gloria 8:Hilda ; If you would like to be a character contact me now along with this info: Name: Class: Allignment(good or evil looking):
the classes you can choose are: 1:Fighter 2:Lancer 3:Warrior 4:Theif 5:Hunter 6:Gunner 7:Cleric 8:Mage 9:Buisnessman(spelling?):only people i choose may be this also you can choose random meaning you can be anything i pick even monsters MONSTERS: get to be lvl 65 and they look kool

item.title: FuturSoft RPG
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Introduction: futurSoft RPG is based of final fantasy BUT its less fantasyish less fights and more quests
Development: FuturSoft Developments founder has created this product as an RPG version of their servers : , FuturScape, Parliscape, Demonicscape, FuturscapeV1-9, Demonicscape 7 etc…
; Will be making a more full version currently im only releasing the DEMO to the public.

Coded in: Ruby ( W00T for ruby! )
Quests:
Demo version: ( 3 total ) so far… may make more demo quests
Missin’ Kitten - save the boys kitten before the shop keeper notices you
Godly Heaven - Get to the 15 godly Heavens in time! ( redo-able(ra))
King o’ Destiny - find a way to the dark kings world and you will see this special cut scene - (not ra)
Full Version: ( 5 total ) so far… may make more quests
Missin’ Kitten - save the boys kitten before the shop keeper notices you
Godly Heaven - Get to the 15 godly Heavens in time! ( redo-able(ra))
King o’ Destiny - find a way to the dark kings world and you will see this special cut scene - (not ra)
The Three Temples - defeat the three boses of the three temples
The Three Caves - defeat the three boses of the three caves
Pictures: click the link

http://img86.imageshack.us/slideshow/player.php?id=img86/200/1172223228qti.smil

Creator: Pbrain30 (me)
Hosted by www.ggames.com can never remember that :S had to copy + paste it

Characters so far:
1:Adam
2:Basil
3:Cyrus
4:Dorothy
5:Estelle
6:Felix
7:Gloria
8:Hilda
;
If you would like to be a character contact me now along with this info:
Name:
Class:
Allignment(good or evil looking):

the classes you can choose are:
1:Fighter
2:Lancer
3:Warrior
4:Theif
5:Hunter
6:Gunner
7:Cleric
8:Mage
9:Buisnessman(spelling?):only people i choose may be this
also you can choose random meaning you can be anything i pick even monsters
MONSTERS:
get to be lvl 65 and they look kool

Read full topic
